N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8155.18 - Village of Mount Kisco

State Regulations
(a) Lexington Avenue. Lexington Avenue between Route 117 and Radio Circle, a
distance of 0.2+- mile. (b) Radio

Circle. Radio Circle between Lexington Avenue and Morgan Drive, a distance of
